To play Repeata Freak, you need to repeat a pattern across a board, so that each section is identical. \n\nHere\'s a standard puzzle:
Drag blocks from the green area to the white board and vice versa, until each section is identical. \n\nHere\'s that same puzzle solved:

Each section must be exactly the same - and here's a special tip just for you - the blocks you're moving around can overflow onto the next line. Whoah, insider secrects. I know, I know. 

If you can't see all of the blocks in the storage area, try scrolling, that should do it. 

To make it harder, go to the preferences on the main sceen and change the difficulty.
\nGood Luck! And remember: Eat, Sleep, Rave, Repeat
Some key things in the app: \n

● Rotating the screen will maintain the same puzzle. 

 ● Puzzles are completely random (random section size, square colors and block size), meaning there are over 1,000,000 possible puzzles on "Super Hard". 

 ● The storage area (green at bottom of screen) can be scrolled up and down. 

 ● Blocks being moved on the board will adaptively fit to where they will 'drop' when placed, including over multiple lines. 

 ● There are sound effects for placing a block on the board, completing a puzzle, and filling the board incorrectly.
